forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 3am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 3am and 4am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 63, with temperatures rising to around 65 overnight. South southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 86. Southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 10pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. South wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 8am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 68. West southwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
